video_prompt: Vibrant pink and white fireworks explode high above, their fiery trails spreading and illuminating the twilight sky. Clouds subtly shift, reflecting the brilliant, expanding light. Below, the calm water ripples, mesmerisingly mirroring each dynamic explosion. Warm lights gently flicker in village windows. In the foreground, spectators subtly shift their gaze, heads turning slightly, captivated by the breathtaking display, their faces reflecting expressions of awe and wonder as new bursts ignite the night.
